name: Fishing on a Flat Earth
description:
A relaxing, pleasant, “open-world” fishing game.

The player can enjoy a whole world of fishing on the open seas, with the only thing between them and their fish being the obnoxious thing we call land… or islands.

Much like the real world, the ocean is endless, but in this case it means you can never leave because there is still fishing to do.

Search the wide world for more fish and locations where fish might be caught even easier to maximize that fish to time ratio.

CONTROLS:

Movement: W, A, S, D

Fish: Spacebar

CREDITS:

Designer - Andrew Mangal

Designer - Andrew Wang

Programmer / Technical Artist - Caleb Zarko

Sound Designer / Music Producer - Siwen Tao

3D Modeler / Programmer - Skyler Haataja

Programmer / Sound Designer / Music Producer - Sophie Martin

3D Modeler - Yunhan Wei
